column5: So today i took my buddy adam out fishing again, last time he put a hook right through my ear if you guys remember my post from 2weeks ago. i took him out again and well he caught his first fish ever and boy what a first! he caught a 13lb 40" pike! i think he has the fish itch now!! all the pics are the same fish and ya i got some with me with the fish ahaha
Dat's a killer Pike for shore!!!... and a helluva first fish!!!  Did it release?... or was it a keeper?  Can't blame a "cherry buster" like that if it was kept!

ya he kept it, i asked him if he wanted to release it or bring it home and hes like KEEP IT! dinner tonight!! it was his fish so its his choice, i gotta teach him the value of selective harvest! i filleted it for him and his family is eating to it night. we also stopped at a tackle shop in town that is doing a fish derby and we entered him in it and hes currently in first place for pike with the derby closing on the 25th, i hope he wins, he'll get a brand new rod and reel!

That's great!!! He got to keep it and show it off a little, and will now have several nice meals from it!!!... not a darn thing in the world wrong with that!  Since it's his first fish ever, it's not like he's decimating the population eh!
I can see keeping your first fish if the person is younger but it's my guess that that fish was either released dead or was put into the pan. Nice job on the catch, how did it taste?  MTBF
Congrats to adam on this huge snake I can see why he wanted to keep it..... being his first and a dandy one Thanks for sharing worm dangler Leechman
First your ear, then the giant pike, that guy doesn't throw anything back! Jim

just curious ...did he weigh and measure you when he caught ya ?   the jury still out as to whether you are extremely brave or dumb for fishing with him again ...lol...  congrates on the catch ....is it normal for pike derbys to allow fish entered on the same day you enter the derby?
so hes got a nickname now eh? thats a helluva fish man!!! where'd you guys catch that friggin giant? i want me some o' dat! lol
nice fish ear hooker.  I hope you gt him on OFC.  IF he comes on he better have the name ear hooker.  Maybe he is already here.

haha he did weigh and measure me, i think he wanted to mount me to LMAO but that just aint gonna happen!!  and ya on the way out i stopped at the little tackle shop on the way out and i seen on the wall a little tourny going on, its free to enter and you just bring the fish in so thats what we did, hes in first for pike and theres 5 days left so i hope he wins, he wins a new rod and reel! haha ya i started calling him that the other day haha, hes not on OFC but that name better be reserved for him! i'll tell ya where that fish came from on msn, on here all im saying is up inbehind bruce mines.
lol theres lots! of good lakes for pike up behind there
is "earhooker" gonna post on here now and will he be called "Earhooker"...  Inquiring minds wanna know  Oh yeah... nice fish tooo
why am i hoping you were referring to wall mounting
